quickCreate.title: Quick Create Club
quickCreate.description: Create a new club with just a name. You can add more details later.

toast.createdDesc: {name} has been created. You can add more details later.
toast.updatedDesc: The club has been successfully updated.
toast.deletedDesc: The club has been successfully deleted.
toast.createError: Failed to create club. Please try again.
toast.updateError: Failed to update club. Please try again.
toast.deleteError: Failed to delete club. Please try again.
